cards.rules_text:
Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you don't, you may create a Treasure token.
{T}, Sacrifice X Historic permanents: Counter target noncreature spell with mana value X or less.
Partner with Arthur Armstrong, Battle Butler
Partner

Trample, haste
Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken Historic permanent, Battle Butler fights target creature.
Partner with Rosalina Ingold, Business Maid
Partner

Vicki LeStrange enters the battlefield tapped and does not untap during your untap step.
Vicki LeStrange has hexproof as long as she is tapped.
{Q}: Each player creates a 1/1 white Spirit token with flying.
Sacrifice three Spirits: Draw a card.
Partner

Whenever you scry, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn.
• Create a Treasure token
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature
• Draw a card
Partner

cards.card_name: Bonbon Von Valentine, Courtesan of Great Repute
cards.rules_text:
Citizens you control get +1/+1 and have riot. [i](This creature enters with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)[/i]
Sacrifice two Treasures: Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. Activate this ability only during your turn.
Partner

If Antoine Hardmeat is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Antoine Hardmeat is that color.
When Antoine Hardmeat enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 Legendary Horse creature token named Custard that is the same color as Antoine Hardmeat and has banding.
Partner

Vigilance
Whenever a creature you control blocks or is blocked, Investigate.
Whenever you sacrifice a token artifact, goad target creature.
Partner

Trample, vigilance
If damage from a creature source would cause one or more poison counters to be put on a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on Max Gentlemen instead. Max then fights each of those creatures. [i](You decide the order in which Max fights in the case of multiple creatures.)[/i]
Partner

Whenever this creature would become a single target of a spell or ability you don't control, create 3 Junk tokens.
{T}, Sacrifice X artifacts you control: Discover X.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

Whenever you scry, you may choose to mill a card that was put on top of your library this way.
[i][i]Descend 4[/i][/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more permanent cards in your graveyard, you create a Treasure token, a Junk token, and a Map token.
Partner

Trample, vigilance, haste
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

[i]Eminence[/i] — As long as Sinterklaas is in the command zone or on the battlefield, at the beginning of your upkeep, each player may choose to gain 3 life, create a Treasure token, or draw a card.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Return Sinterklaas to the command zone. Any player may activate this ability.
Partner

First strike, vigilance, sadist [i](Whenever this creature deals combat damage to another creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness and Summer Starling deals damage equal to its power to any target.
Partner

Deathtouch
Whenever a creature dies, Samuel Finch explores.
Whenever a creature enters your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, gain 1 life and create a Treasure token.
Partner

When Cashious Villionaire enters the battlefield, destroy all token permanents that each opponent controls.
Players cannot create tokens.
{1}{BR}{BR}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Cashious Villionaire. He becomes a Demon in addition to his other creature types and gains menace this turn.

Whenever a spell or ability your opponent controls would counter a spell or ability you control, that opponent sacrifices a permanent and you create a Treasure token.
{1}{GW}{GW}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Angel Fullbody becomes an Angel in addition to her other creature types and gains vigilance this turn.

Stock Exchange enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{2}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Stock Exchange: Draw a card.

Uptown Barbershop enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{2}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Uptown Barbershop: Draw a card.
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more historic permanents. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, Battles, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]

Workers Slums enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Workers Slums: Draw a card.

Boxing Gym enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boxing Gym: Draw a card.

Town Square enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {G}.
{2}{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Town Square: Draw a card.

{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Executive Office enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap a legendary creature you control: Create a Treasure token.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure token: Create a Clue token.
{T}, Sacrifice a Clue token: Create a Blood token.

{T}: Add {C}.
Tap a legendary creature you control: Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen token.
{T}, Sacrifice ten creatures: Create a 3/3 white Employee token named “Kingsman” with “Legendary creatures you control get +1/+1.”

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure token: Create a Gold token.
If a spell or ability an opponent controls would cause you to pay an additional cost, counter that spell or ability.

Sacrifice two Treasure tokens: Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may exile one of those cards. You may play that card until your next end step. Put the other two on the bottom of your library in any order.
{T}, Sacrifice X Treasure tokens: Mill X cards. You may return one card milled this way to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Ello Stranga'. I've got that high-class smut for ya.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Cherry Belle enters, create three tapped Treasure tokens.
When an outlaw enters the battlefield under your control, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, exile Cherry Belle, then return her to the battlefield transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Cherry Belle Damsel is a Human Mercenary creature with vigilance and power and toughness equal to her loyalty. She is still a planeswalker.
[+1]: Cherry Belle Damsel gains your choice of first strike, deathtouch, or trample this turn.
[-1]: Exile target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains life equal to its mana value.
cards.special_text2:

[+1]: Cherry Belle Damsel gains your choice of first strike, deathtouch, or trample this turn.
[-1]: Exile target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains life equal to its mana value.

• Proliferate.

• Gain 2 life.

cards.rules_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Flower Bouquet: Add one mana of any color.
When Flower Bouquet leaves the battlefield, you may choose up to one target historic permanent or player. Add a counter of any type that is present on that permanent or player. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, Battles, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]

When Fisticuffs Tonic enters, draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice Fisticuffs Tonic: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

When Moustache Tonic enters, draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice Moustache Tonic: Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
Target opponent sacrifices an artifact of their choice. If they can't, you gain 2 life and draw a card. Then repeat this process for an enchantment and a battle.

Vanishing 5 [i](This permanent enters with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
Whenever you commit a crime, draw a card. [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]

Vanishing 5
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice as many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on you or another permanent you control, it puts twice as many counters on that player or permanent instead.

Vanishing 5 [i](This permanent enters with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
Legendary creatures your opponents control don't untap during their controller's untap step.
Whenever one or more counters are put on a creature or planeswalker you control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Kicker—Sacrifice a Food.
Create a 1/1 white Dog creature token with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, create a Treasure token.”
If this spell was kicked, creatures you control gain haste this turn.
Remove all counters from target creature.
Each player chooses a creature they control. Choose one of those creatures at random. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and exile the rest.
